mapper.select: select a.id as "id", a.type as "type", a.title as "title", a.ip_address as "ip_address", a.start_time as "start_time", a.end_time as "end_time", a.mac_address as "mac_address", a.limit_num as "limit_num", a.other_limit as "other_limit", a.version_num as "version_num", a.order_by as "order_by", a.status as "status", a.remark as "remark", a.create_time as "create_time", a.create_user as "create_user", a.create_organize as "create_organize", a.update_user as "update_user", a.update_time as "update_time" from common_authcert a where a.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into common_authcert ( id, type, title, ip_address, start_time, end_time, mac_address, limit_num, other_limit, version_num, order_by, status, remark, create_time, create_user, create_organize, update_user, update_time ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{start_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{end_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mac_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{limit_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other_limit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order_by,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_organize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{update_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{update_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update common_authcert set title=#{title}, ip_address=#{ip_address}, start_time=#{start_time}, end_time=#{end_time}, mac_address=#{mac_address}, limit_num=#{limit_num}, other_limit=#{other_limit}, version_num=#{version_num}, remark=#{remark}, order_by=#{order_by}, status=#{status}, update_user=#{update_user}, update_time=#{update_time} where id=#{id}
mapper.delete:
delete from common_authcert where id in
#{id}
